alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Grady (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 19 at 8:47PM CDT until September 19 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GRADY...SOUTHWESTERN OKLAHOMA...NORTHERN CLEVELAND...SOUTHEASTERN CANADIAN AND NORTHWESTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 847 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blanchard, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Norman, Moore, Midwest City, Del City, Newcastle, Blanchard, Mustang, Choctaw, Noble, Tuttle, Spencer, Nicoma Park, Goldsby, Valley Brook, Bridge Creek, Stanley Draper Lake, Stella, Tinker Air Force Base, and Middleberg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
